text: Nikita Denisovich Kozlov (; born 4 April 1997) is a Russian football player who plays for Naftan Novopolotsk. ==Club career== He made his debut in the Russian Professional Football League for FC Chita on 4 August 2018 in a game against FC Irtysh Omsk. ==References== ==External links== * Profile by Russian Professional Football League * * Category:1997 births Category:Sportspeople from Tomsk Category:Living people Category:Russian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Russian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Belarus Category:FC Khimki players Category:FC Naftan Novopolotsk players
title: Nikita Kozlov
